heading: HR00375
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON PUBLIC ORDER AND DANGEROUS DRUGS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL TRADE OF DRUGS AND OTHER SUBSTANCES IN THE NEW BILIBID PRISON (NBP) AND TO DETERMINE THE INVOLVEMENT OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND TO PROPOSE MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE MATTER
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2016-09-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00375
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON PUBLIC ORDER AND DANGEROUS DRUGS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL TRADE OF DRUGS AND OTHER SUBSTANCES IN THE NEW BILIBID PRISON (NBP) AND TO DETERMINE THE INVOLVEMENT OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND TO PROPOSE MEASURES TO ADDRESS THE MATTER
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : HERNANDEZ, FERDINAND L.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-19
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2016-09-26
